name: Winter Break (Broyi)
description:
• Three main routes!
  • A cute doggo, a cute tiger, and a cute bear. 🐶🥞🐯🍜🐻🍺
  • This game was made in about a month and a week, and was originally planned as a submission for the Winter VN Jam. (Gah, I missed the deadline...!)
  • The game will try to detect if your device is powerful enough for Live2D when it first launches-- if you don't like it or if it detects wrong, you can also switch it off from the Preferences menu.
  • If you wanna keep up with Rudi, Torataro and Oliver, follow me on Twitter! You can also ask me (or the OCs) anon questions too. Oh, and, if you enjoyed, consider tossing me a bit of Ko-fi! I really appreciate it.
